name: PerformActionOnMachineGroup
helpMarkDown: Perform actions like start, stop, delete on a machine group
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Subscription under which the Resource Group is deployed and optional for pre-existing machine group.

inputs.name: MachineGroupName
inputs.label: Machine Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the target machine group for performing the action.

inputs.name: Action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Action to be performed on the machines or machine group.

inputs.name: Filters
inputs.label: Apply to Machines
inputs.helpMarkDown: By default, actions apply to all machines in a machine group. To apply the action to a subset of machines, provide tags or machine names like Role: Web, Role: Test, BudgetIT01. Filters are not applied for block or unblock actions.

inputs.name: BlockedFor
inputs.label: Block For
inputs.helpMarkDown: Block a machine group either for an instance like a particular Build, or for the definition i.e. for all the instances of the definition.

inputs.name: TimeInHours
inputs.label: Time in Hours
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of hours that the machines will be blocked for. Default value 0 indicates that the machines will be blocked indefinitely.
